calculator.monthlyBreakdownTooltip: Shows your monthly income, deductions, and take-home pay. Each row represents one month of the tax year (April to March). Click on a month to see cumulative calculations up to that point.
calculator.weeklyBreakdownTooltip: Shows your weekly income, deductions, and take-home pay. Each row represents one week of the tax year. Click on a week to see cumulative calculations up to that point.
calculator.taxBreakdownTooltip: {{type}} shows how your income is taxed at different rates. Each band represents a portion of your income that is taxed at a specific rate.
calculator.annualSummaryTooltip: A summary of your annual earnings, total deductions (Income Tax + National Insurance), and final take-home pay. These figures represent your total income and deductions for the full tax year.

forms.title: Tax Forms and Documents
forms.description: Access and download important tax forms and documents

p87.title: P87 Form - Tax Relief for Employment Expenses
p87.description: Use this form to claim tax relief for employment expenses
p87.details: You can claim for the current tax year and the previous 4 tax years
eligibleItems: Tools and equipment for your job
ineligibleItems: Items your employer has already reimbursed you for

p60.title: P60 End of Year Certificate
p60.description: Shows the total amount of pay and tax deducted in the tax year
p60.details: Your employer must give you a P60 by 31 May if you were employed by them on the last day of the tax year (5 April)

p45.title: P45 Form
p45.description: Shows how much you've been paid and how much tax you've paid so far in the tax year
p45.details: You get a P45 when you stop working for an employer. Give it to your new employer when you change jobs
